title: Online Subscriptions
content:
At Qatar Academy, we have subscriptions to some excellent sites that provide books for students to read online. All sites offer a wide variety of books across a variety of genres (non-fiction, graphic novels, etc.)  Many of the books are read aloud so that younger children can follow along.  
TumbleBookLibrary is an online collection of animated, talking picture books which is for younger readers.  Tumblebook Cloud is aimed at older readers.  Both Tumblebook Library and Cloud can be accessed here: http://www.tumblebooks.com/   Username: qatar PW: books   (library) Username: qatar PW: login     (cloud) Another wonderful site is Story Online: http://www.storylineonline.net/  This site has picture books being read aloud by different actors and actresses.   The books on these sites should first be checked by an adult before the child begins reading to ensure that the content and the reading level is appropriate for their child.     Our library homepage can also link you to these sites and to many more useful webpages: http://library.qf.org.qa/common/servlet/presenthomeform.do?l2m=Home&tm=Home
